title: Boji
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Organic cafe at 東京都港区赤坂4-3-15, FSK赤坂ビル1F. Offering some vegan food and sweets, house-made bread, selection of drinks including Italian wine, plus beer and shochu. Uses seasonal vegetables from organic farmers in western Japan. Relocated from Shimouma 2-27-14, Setagaya in late 2013. Note Jan 2016 FB page is still active.
